Blog.post: hey,tmr is photo taking day leh!! whao so fast wor..now only july..last yr is during oct leh.. this yr so fast de..haiya,i also havent prepared myself..haha(actually there is nth i have 2 prepare)woo!! how m i going 2 take photo tmr leh..? smile?or dun smile? giv attitude..hee..haiz.. i think i just take it naturally lah..think so much crazy ah..kill my brain cells only..haiya..haha!! after the photo taking i wanna buy the 8R 1 ..hehe copy aiwen..lke tt thn can see clearer..okay lah,dun write so many le.. i still wnt 2 write bout other things 1..

soo difficult to decide leh..which subject to choose 4 nx yr.. if cannot manage to the top 2 or 3 classes hor,thn i have 2 take either home econ, d&t or art leh.. and i dont wish to take neither this three sub loh.. all o troublesome 1..have to do cousework thn difficult to score also..haiz.. but the problem is i sure cannot make it to the top classes taking science 1..me everything so poor except sci but also cannot take sci,me language too poor le.. haiz,nvm loh.. happy go lucky loh

haha..i just wnt 2 continue the 13 july 1..hee..lazy to edit leh..i would think of leaving is bcoz too depressed n too stress le loh.. my brain playing tricks wif me..very sorry to let every1 worry loh..now it is over le..i will try to tolerate n give in.. yeah..

yu hoo.. me cum n update my blog le..my now in a very depressed state leh..dunno wnt 2 continue bball mah..i really useless in the match loh..zhong can bu zhong yong lah..eventhough i stay coach also wont use me 1 mah..i at there also 4 decorating only..mayb is bcoz my standard really dropped loh..after thoday this match, very sad loh..this may be my last match..y ppl so concern?i quit a not it doesnt matter 1 wht..if thy didnt stop me,may tt is the end of me n bball..now thinking back,very thank you to those ppl tt ask me to stay loh..now i'm quite awake bah,thn just lke wht jingmei say loh..if i quit i really would regret..luckily i gave myself thime 2 consider if not i will be living in regret.. very thank you everybody!!n i'm very sorry 4 being so foolish loh.. although u see i now lke enlightened le hor..my heart is still not very stable yet.. many things happened n i still mayb thought of leaving again bah..see how long i can tolerate loh.. i will try to..

haha..today no need 2 go out so happy..got time 2 study le..haiz,the pass few wks i'm just too busy n tire to study..and my result all drop loh!!i'm so depressed n sad..nvm,i start now concentrating on studies..jiayou(haha) waoh!!just now i went 2 see ppl's blog n i surprised to found out sumthing..(hehe)haiz,after seeing my friend's blog,i found out tt last few wks i was lke living in my own world leh,i talk less to my friends,wht is happening around me i also dunno..now tt i found out some under ground relationship in my class, i was so call surprise bah..but it should be a piece of gd news bah hor..hehe,thy are finally clear of there feelings n accept each other le.. haha,although thy didnt admit,thy already admit each other in their hearts le loh..dunno who i saying rite(hehe)i protecting them leh..see i so gd..mayb u all also knw le bah..(hee)i dunno y loh,i was lke seperated from the world the few weeks back..and there is a feeling tt i wasted my two wks of time..and my friends had all distanced from me..mayb this is y i m depressed bah..i hope i can keep up on this kind of speed in the following days..

y lke tat..! so sad today..i just couldn't 4get it..every second every moment we played,i really really wish the time could reverse and let everything start again.. we should be the 1 winning wht,y the result turn out to be... i m totally in blame,i was nervous,i was too gentle to them,i was not concentrating.. all these are not suppose to be happening on me.. mayb is bcoz of the pressure..haiz,every1 was feeling down n every1 cried.. this isnt a good match we play..this isnt our standard..we r sure to win them one fine day!! cheer up cheer up,thy r not stronger thn us..is only tt we were off form n nervous.. we can beat them another time de!!

haiz haiz haiz.. y thy dun understand 1.. pls loh,i dun lke him leh..y my class idiot say until as if it is true.. i also dunno wht makes them think i lke him loh.. pls loh,i so despo meh..thn the rumour now is getting bigger n bigger loh..haiz,thy dun understand ppl's feelings 1 leh.. only occasionally sms him mah,does this makes them think i lke him? yuckz loh,thy dun understand..very stressed leh.. haiya,no wonder i so short tempered nowadays..thanks 2 those idiots in my class loh.. really feel lke telling them leh..

haiz..today losed again..all because of the bias referee lah..bias until lke tt..if u watch closer hor,the other team foul very very seldom only loh.. mayb i think too much le lah or mayb i no sportmanship..but 1 thing i can confirm is tt THE REFEREE BIAS!!! he did saw she hit my hand loh,n not very soft leh..is extremely loud loh.. thn he just look away,act blur..haiz,even my coach scolded the bias referee..

argg!! i just cant stand those bitches and backstabber in my class.. always shout ,scream and talk loudly in class to attract attention.. pls loh.. no1 is snatching from u all lah..u all already get all the attention le loh..so greedy,still wnt more mah..i had enough of u all loh..dun push me further,or u all will regret.. now 4 the backstabber..u knw who u r and stop spreading rumours about me.. wht benefits u 4 backstabbing me.. i really dunno loh.. u really hate me that much mah..i also nv do anything 2 u,n i once treat u s friend do u knw..but not ever ever again..you r no longer my friend but enermy. i really dunno wht hav i done that makes u potrared me s such a bitch loh.. or m i really 1? haiz.. dun understand u.. does being a backstabber fun? actually, it is not a fun thing loh,u'll get hated loh..haiz.. 4get it lah..just dun let me caught u saying me again..
